## 18 Feb 2024
{: #network-latency-2024-02-18}

### Inter-region latency
{: #network-latency-2024-02-18-mzr}

| Average latency (ms) | Dallas | Toronto | Washington DC | Frankfurt | London | Madrid | Osaka | Sydney | Tokyo | Sao Paulo |
| --- | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: |
| **Dallas** |   | 34 | 32 | 122 | 113 | 118 | 149 | 186 | 142 | 144 |
| **Toronto** |  34 |  | 19 | 93 | 82 | 106 | 170 | 215 | 162 | 128 |
| **Washington DC** |  32 | 19 |  | 98 | 75 | 87 | 174 | 216 | 167 | 118 |
| **Frankfurt** |  122 | 91 | 98 |  | 12 | 29 | 242 | 249 | 235 | 194 |
| **London** |  112 | 82 | 75 | 12 |  | 26 | 253 | 262 | 247 | 186 |
| **Madrid** |  118 | 106 | 88 | 29 | 26 |  | 267 | 274 | 259 | 206 |
| **Osaka** |  150 | 171 | 174 | 243 | 254 | 267 |  | 124 | 9 | 293 |
| **Sydney** |  185 | 215 | 215 | 249 | 261 | 274 | 123 |  | 117 | 329 |
| **Tokyo** |  142 | 163 | 167 | 235 | 246 | 260 | 9 | 116 |  | 284 |
| **Sao Paulo** |  144 | 128 | 117 | 194 | 185 | 207 | 292 | 327 | 284 |  |
{: caption="Table 45. 20 Jan 2024–18 Feb 2024" caption-side="bottom"}
